title.value: Estimation of collection samples of vegetable pea by the content of starch grains
Характеристика сортообразцов гороха овощного по содержанию крахмальных зерен

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Maksimenya, I.V., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on the preliminary evaluation of varieties and hybrids of field pea (Pisum arvense L.) which was based on differences in structure of starch grains in biologically ripened seeds. As a result of an estimation of collection samples of peas vegetable under the content of starch grains breeds the Premium, Atlas, by Sovinter 1, HK-21-10 as a quality source of production are secreted. From among hybrids F2 forms are noted 03-09-2, 03-09-3-2, 05-09-2, 05-09-4, 05-09-8-2, 05-09-9, 05-09-10 which are characterised by the low content of simple starched granules and will be used in selection on increase of technological qualities of green peas.
